title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$x(x-4)=32+5\left(x^2-16\right)$$.

title: Solve the Equation
text: Let's factor to solve. $$\left(x+4\right) \left(x-3\right)=0$$. $$x=-4$$ is not a solution since it is in the denominator. $$x=3$$ is a solution.
